name: Domyno
description:
This is a game about pressing the red button, but for doing that you will have to find a quite unconventional way of doing that, like using the domino pieces to press it.

Really simple game, made in less than a day for the MashUp Game Jam 2, with the theme of UNCONVENTIONAL MEANS. The game doesn't have music because this is made for entertaining just a few minutes.

Don't forget to leave a comment of what do you think about this simple concept!

CONTROLS

  • Left click - Place piece
  • Right click - Remove piece
  • Scroll wheel - Rotate piece
  • R - Retry
  • P/Enter - Play
  • Esc - Hide UI
